column2: Awful! Worst migraine tracker ever. First off to record the time you're supposed to click when the migraine starts and when it stops. Migraines can last for days!! And if you are like me it never fully goes away. It just gets worse
column4: then shoots back up. You can't even record ANYTHING! No triggers
column7: nothing useful. You may as well use a stopwatch because that's what this is. Uninstalling!!

column2: Hate it! I tried recording my migraine this morning and it didn't record
I would like to see ability to add what needs you took and what ... I would like to see ability to add what needs you took and what symptoms you had
Could be great Could be great app. Needs more functionality. Need to be able to edit or add. Love how easy to start/stop but needs ti be adjustable. Hopeful for changes or will uninstall
It is overall a good app. It does exactly what it says well. I would like to see a few features added.
Didn't feel there was enough to track. Wanted to track treatments and triggers such ... Didn't feel there was enough to track. Wanted to track treatments and triggers such this app didn't do.
Not worth the icon space Total Crap.
